entry.sentence: Sudden honking and squealing tires made her flinch .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NN Sudden) (NN honking) (CC and) (NN squealing) (NNS tires)) (VP (VBD made) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN flinch))) (. .)))

nsubj(lost-3, She-1) advmod(lost-3, almost-2) root(ROOT-0, lost-3) poss(balance-5, her-4) dobj(lost-3, balance-5)

entry.sentence: Heavens , had the truck driver gone crazy ?
entry.parse: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (NP (NNS Heavens)) (, ,) (VP (VBN had) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN truck) (NN driver)) (VP (VBN gone) (S (ADJP (JJ crazy))))))) (. ?)))
entry.deps: root(ROOT-0, Heavens-1) partmod(Heavens-1, had-3) det(driver-6, the-4) nn(driver-6, truck-5) dobj(had-3, driver-6) partmod(driver-6, gone-7) acomp(gone-7, crazy-8)

entry.sentence: There was a loud bang as he crashed into the passenger car next to her .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (EX There)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (DT a) (JJ loud) (NN bang)) (SBAR (IN as) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD crashed) (PP (IN into) (NP (DT the) (NN passenger) (NN car))) (ADVP (JJ next) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP her)))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: expl(was-2, There-1) root(ROOT-0, was-2) det(bang-5, a-3) amod(bang-5, loud-4) nsubj(was-2, bang-5) mark(crashed-8, as-6) nsubj(crashed-8, he-7) advcl(was-2, crashed-8) det(car-12, the-10) nn(car-12, passenger-11) prep_into(crashed-8, car-12) prep_next_to(crashed-8, her-15)

entry.sentence: In the next moment , Lorena was hit by it and thrown to the side .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN In) (NP (DT the) (JJ next) (NN moment))) (, ,) (NP (NNP Lorena)) (VP (VBD was) (VP (VP (VBN hit) (PP (IN by) (NP (PRP it)))) (CC and) (VP (VBN thrown) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (NN side)))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(moment-4, the-2) amod(moment-4, next-3) prep_in(hit-8, moment-4) nsubjpass(hit-8, Lorena-6) nsubjpass(thrown-12, Lorena-6) auxpass(hit-8, was-7) root(ROOT-0, hit-8) agent(hit-8, it-10) conj_and(hit-8, thrown-12) det(side-15, the-14) prep_to(thrown-12, side-15)

entry.sentence: She landed on her stomach on the curb .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP She)) (VP (VBD landed) (PP (IN on) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN stomach))) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT the) (NN curb)))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: A searing pain jolted through her chest .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (DT A) (JJ searing) (NN pain)) (VP (VBD jolted) (PP (IN through) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN chest)))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(pain-3, A-1) amod(pain-3, searing-2) nsubj(jolted-4, pain-3) root(ROOT-0, jolted-4) poss(chest-7, her-6) prep_through(jolted-4, chest-7)

entry.sentence: The last thing she perceived was a young man with a hat on his curly hair , who came rushing out of his car with a horrified expression .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (JJ last) (NN thing)) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD perceived))))) (VP (VBD was) (NP (NP (DT a) (JJ young) (NN man)) (PP (IN with) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN hat)) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ curly) (NN hair)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHNP (WP who)) (S (VP (VBD came) (S (VP (VBG rushing) (PRT (RP out)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN car))) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT a) (JJ horrified) (NN expression)))))))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: det(thing-3, The-1) amod(thing-3, last-2) dobj(perceived-5, thing-3) nsubj(man-9, thing-3) nsubj(perceived-5, she-4) rcmod(thing-3, perceived-5) cop(man-9, was-6) det(man-9, a-7) amod(man-9, young-8) root(ROOT-0, man-9) det(hat-12, a-11) prep_with(man-9, hat-12) poss(hair-16, his-14) amod(hair-16, curly-15) prep_on(hat-12, hair-16) nsubj(came-19, hair-16) rcmod(hair-16, came-19) xcomp(came-19, rushing-20) poss(car-24, his-23) prep_out_of(rushing-20, car-24) det(expression-28, a-26) amod(expression-28, horrified-27) prep_with(rushing-20, expression-28)

entry.sentence: Then a merciful faintness relieved her of her pain .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (RB Then) (NP (DT a) (JJ merciful) (NNS faintness)) (VP (VBD relieved) (NP (PRP her)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN pain)))) (. .)))
